data.title: Harold PINTER (#6183) - The Cobbold Family History Trust
data.text:
#6183, Harold PINTER

Born 1930 in Hackney, London Died 2008 in London

Harold was previously married (1956) to Vivien Merchant, Actress (1929-1982); they had a son, Daniel Pinter. Harold's parents were Hyman (Jack) Pinter born in London on 31st March 1902 who died in Hove in 1997; (he was a tailor of womens clothing who came of Jewish, Polish stock) and Frances Mann Moskowitz born in London on 26th February 1904 who died, also in Hove in 1992.
